name: .DISCO File Extension
summary: Learn about .DISCO files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Information file published by DISCO, a Microsoft application for publishing and discovering Web Services; formatted in XML and contains links to other discovery documents, XSD schemas, and service descriptions.

content: DISCO files are accessed by the Web Services Discovery Tool (Disco.exe), included with Microsoft ASP.NET development software.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
